troubleshooting.title: Cannot connect to Katalon TestOps server. Please check your Internet connection and try again (2)

cause.p: This error message means that the application has failed to communicate with Katalon Server for activation.

step.cmd: Check your Internet connection and try again.
step.info: If you're behind a Proxy Server, before activating Katalon Studio, you need to configure the Authentication Proxy settings. At the bottom of the Activation dialog box, click Configure Authentication Proxy. See: Configure Proxy for Authentication.
